solkris.ru.astel

Class SyntaxEditText.LexAn

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • solkris.ru.astel.SyntaxEditText.LexAn
  • Enclosing class:
    SyntaxEditText

    public class SyntaxEditText.LexAn
extends <any>
    Asynchronous flow line analysis. It is a process of lexical analysis of changes in line formation from the resulting stream of tokens a new line and its replacement by the calculated coordinates.
